updates.content: We're investigating the cause, seems to be related to Fastly (their status page and homepage are currently down).

Even Netlify CI is having issues: please follow this Twitter thread for live updates about the incident.

https://twitter.com/datocms/status/1402204141259214850

We've removed Fastly altogheter and put plan B into action: tripled the resources and fallback to custom cache on Redis. We're back online and running again. We are monitoring requests to see how they progress over time.
